basics.label: Front-end developer
basics.name: Mikhail Korolev
basics.summary:
Front-end developer with a passion to JavaScript, Rails and interesting challenges.
@mkrl on Github

work.summary: Maintaining a high variety of educational web services. Developing design prototypes from Scratch into HTML/CSS. Supporting legacy code on a regular basis. Basic SQL: Postgresql, MySQL.
highlights: Ported a handful of legacy Open CMS websites to the modern stack.
Developed several purely front-end applications working with the remote CRM API (1C).
Successfully pushed Ruby on Rails into our team stack for the sake of easing the process of developing small applications.

work.summary: Landing pages, plain simple CMS-based websites for small companies, web design, prototyping. PHP.

publications.name: Small personal blog
publications.summary: I'm writing some of my thoughts down, mostly JS related.

interests.name: GitHub
interests.summary: I use GitHub on a daily basis. Starting from my todo list and monitoring OSS I'm interested in, to contributing, working and sharing projects of my own.

interests.name: Digital art
interests.summary: I used to draw stuff in my spare time. This is how I originally came to the Web - as a designer.

interests.name: Water drinking
interests.summary: I love drinks of a different kind. I enjoy good coffee on my lunch breaks but water is my â„–1 liquid source.
